data.title: Ringgold County IAGenWeb Project
data.text:
Marcellus FRANCIS, son of Maryland S. and Martha (FAIRBANKS) FRANCIS, was born July 21, 1845, Lawrencebury, Dearborn County, Illinois, and died November 5, 1927, Leavenworth, Kansas. Marcellus married October 28, 1866 to Margaret TOMLINSON, born September 5, 1846, Elkhart, Indiana, and died April 22, 1926, Leavenworth, Kansas. Marcellus and Margaret (TOMLINSON) FRANCIS were the parents of eleven children:

1) Cora E. FRANCIS, born 21 Jan 1869; died circa 1906; never married

2) Ida Mae FRANCIS

born 02 Feb 1879, Rochester, Andrew Co. MO; died 12 May 1961, Fargo, Ellis Co. OK

married William Henry MORGAN on 12 Feb 1896, Bedford, Taylor Co. IA

born 16 Mar 1866, Bedford, Taylor Co. IA; died 26 Sep 1944

3) John Alvozed FRANCIS, born 09 Feb 1872, MO; died 17 Aug 1948, Greeley, Weld Co. CO

married circa 1896 Dora MURPHIN

4) Martha Meeks FRANCIS

born 22 Jun 1874, Maryvill, Nodaway Co. MO; died 26 Jan 1919, Gage, Ellis Co. OK

married 27 Dec 1898, Conway, Taylor Co. IA Ellis Harry HUGHES

Ellis Harry HUGHES was the son of Rev.Jeremiah T. and Amy (NEWTON) HUGHES

5) Frederick Harrison FRANCIS, born 29 Jun 1876, Maryville, Nodaway Co. MO; died MO

6) William M. FRANCIS, born 19 Sep 1878; died at birth

7) Grace M. FRANCIS, born 18 Aug 1880; died at birth

8) Mary Ann FRANCIS, born 15 Feb 1881; died at birth

9) Clara Loretta FRANCIS, born 02 Nov 1882, Maryville, Nodaway Co. MO; died Sep 1970, IA

married Arthur STOWELL on 01 Feb 1900, Conway, Taylor Co. IA

born 06 Jun 1880; died Nov 1967, Kellerton, Ringgold Co. IA

10) Harley Ubert FRANCIS

born 10 Jan 1885, Bedford, Taylor Co. IA; 29 Sep 1964, St. Joseph, Buchanan Co. MO

married Mamie Helena DEAN 1908

born 11 Sep 1891, Fargo, Ellis Co. OK; died 20 Sep 1961, St. Joseph, Buchanan Co. MO

11) Ora Katherine FRANCIS

born 16 Feb 1888, Bedford, Taylor Co. IA; died St. Joseph, Buchanan Co. MO

married Harry BRAKEY
